Expires: 2025-10-15

Active
Deputy Manager HR Saeed Ghani Karachi Are you passionate about building a strong workforce and driving employee engagement in a fast-paced retail manufacturing environment? Join our team as Deputy Manager HR and play a key role in shaping people, culture, and performance. 📍 Location: Head Office, Karachi 📊 Experience: 5–7 years in HR (Retail / FMCG / Manufacturing preferred) 🎓 Education: Bachelor’s/Master’s in HR, Business Administration, or related field 💰 Salary Range: PKR 150,000 – 180,000 (based on experience) What You’ll Do: ✨ Lead recruitment and on-boarding across head office, retail, Warehouse and factory roles. ✨ Drive performance management, appraisals, and succession planning. ✨ Foster employee engagement and handle grievance resolution with empathy. ✨ Coordinate training & development programs to build future-ready talent. ✨ Ensure HR compliance, payroll coordination, and policy adherence. ✨ Implement HR process improvements and best practices. What We’re Looking For: ✅ Proven HR experience in retail manufacturing or FMCG industries. ✅ Strong knowledge of HR policies, labor laws, and compliance. ✅ Hands-on experience with Decibel HR software or any other HRM Software. ✅ Excellent communication, people management, and conflict resolution skills. ✅ Analytical, detail-oriented, and hands-on with HR systems. ✅ A collaborative leader with a people-first mindset. 📩 Interested candidates can share their CVs at m.zainsiddiqui@saeedghani1888.com
📍 Karachi#Deputy Manager HR🧳 Experienced Required

Posted: 2025-10-01

Expires: 2025-10-11

Expired
Thal Engineering is seeking a "Deputy Manager – Talent Acquisition" to join its Plant in Korangi, Karachi. Responsibilities include managing end-to-end recruitment processes, partnering with business leaders on workforce planning, developing sourcing strategies, and driving employer branding initiatives. The ideal candidate should hold a bachelor’s or master’s degree, possesses 5-7 years of relevant experience in talent acquisition, strong knowledge of recruitment tools and ATS and demonstrated stakeholder management and leadership abilities. This role offers the opportunity to contribute to a dynamic environment focused on growth, international quality standards, and continuous improvement practices. Interested candidates with the requisite background are invited to submit their resumes to jobs@thalengg.com by Oct 10, 2025. Please indicate the job title in the subject line. Kindly note that only shortlisted candidates will receive further communication.
